title: LighningCashDev
author: LighningCashDev
created_time: September 27, 2023, 05:13:28 AMLast edit: December 11, 2024, 04:31:05 AM by LighningCashDev
content: LIGHTNINGCASH-REBORNLNCR(Ticker)Launched on September 23 2023MANDATORY WALLET UPGRADE !! version 2.0.0you have until January 1st 2025 to upgrade your walletNew changes : - new checkpoint for faster sync, more seednodes, smaller base fee of 1000 sats instead of 10000 ( transaction too large errors should occur less ! ) , and from January 1st 2025, 50 % of the bee creation fee will go to the community fund, this will help list the coin on more exchanges and promote LNCR.source code : https://github.com/MerlinMagic2018/LightningCash-RDirect wallet download links :For linuxhttps://github.com/MerlinMagic2018/LightningCash-R/releases/download/LightningCash-Reborn-v2.0.0/LightningCash-Reborn-v2.0.0-pc-linux-gnu.zipFor windowshttps://github.com/MerlinMagic2018/LightningCash-R/releases/download/LightningCash-Reborn-v2.0.0/LightningCash-Reborn-v2.0.0-Win64.zipDownload wallet :https://github.com/MerlinMagic2018/LightningCash-R/releases/tag/LightningCash-Reborn-v2.0.0Download miner :https://github.com/MerlinMagic2018/cpuminer-RKZ/releasesOfficial Pool ( No fee ) :https://pool.lightningcash-reborn.space/Pools list and stats :https://miningpoolstats.stream/lightningcashrExplorer :https://explorer.lightningcash-reborn.space/Exchanges :https://www.xeggex.com/Discord :https://discord.gg/T3AmscGdNTYou can claim your old LightningCash balance How to claim balance from LightningCash :in the LightningCash wallet console window, type :  ``dumpwallet``then in the new LightningCash-Reborn console window, type : ``importwallet`` with the location of the dump.All balances under 100 LNC won't be claimable ( represent less then 1 % of the 67 millions coins )

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added LighteningCashR (LNCR) to http://zpool.ca/algo/yespowerLTNCG. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine yespowerLTNCG and get paid in LNCR:Code:-a yespowerLTNCG -o stratum+tcp://yespowerLTNCG.mine.zpool.ca:6245 -u LNCR_ADDRESS -p c=LNCR Exchange to BTC:Code:-a yespowerLTNCG -o stratum+tcp://yespowerLTNCG.mine.zpool.ca:6245 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for yespowerLTNCG: 56245==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_
